pullRequest.title: Enable fips region to work with Access point ARN.

nodes.bodyText: can we define two variables here so that they can be reused below?
let's create a variable for this
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -167,10 +161,11 @@ private static ConfiguredS3SdkHttpRequest applyEndpointConfigurationForAccessPoi
                                 .accountId(
                                     s3EndpointResource.accountId().orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException(
                                         "An S3 access point ARN must have an account ID")))
-                                .region(arnRegion)
+                                .region(removeFipsIfNeeded(arnRegion))
                                 .protocol(request.protocol())
                                 .domain(clientPartitionMetadata.dnsSuffix())
                                 .dualstackEnabled(dualstackEnabled)
+                                .fipsEnabled(isFipsRegionProvided(region.toString(), arnRegion, serviceConfiguration.useArnRegionEnabled()))

nodes.bodyText: Don't think we should make changes in s3 control
